headlines: NEW INFORMATION: Fire forces inmate evacuations at Pima County jail
description: As of 9 p.m. Friday, there were no reported injuries.

headlines: Father released to pretrial services following death of young Marana girl left in hot car
description: 37-year-old Christopher Scholtes was taken into custody early Friday, July 12, on charges of second-degree murder and child abuse.

headlines: Voter’s guide language for Arizona Abortion Access Act lands in court
description: The first hearing for what could be many court challenges to Arizona’s abortion initiative was held in Phoenix this afternoon.

headlines: 1 killed, 1 injured in shooting in Phoenix apartment pool area
description: One man is dead and another is badly injured after an overnight shooting at an apartment complex in the Ahwatukee area.

headlines: Alabama man accused of stabbing woman to death in Kingman
description: A man from Alabama is facing murder charges after he allegedly stabbed a woman to death in Kingman.

headlines: Alec Baldwin’s case dismissed in middle of involuntary manslaughter trial
description: A New Mexico judge on Friday threw out the involuntary manslaughter case against Alec Baldwin in the middle of his trial and said it cannot be filed again.

headlines: Eric Ridenour convicted of burning two Douglas churches
description: A jury of eight women and four men convicted Eric Ridenour on six counts for burning two churches in Douglas in May 2023.

headlines: Trooper injured after driver crashes into fire department, DPS vehicle in Flagstaff
description: A trooper is recovering after a driver crashed into two emergency vehicles on a busy northern Arizona freeway on Thursday night.

headlines: Police identify woman found shot to death at downtown Phoenix hotel
description: Police have released the name of a woman who was found shot to death at a popular downtown Phoenix hotel nearly a week ago.

headlines: Douglas community says justice is served with Eric Ridenour conviction
description: Community members in Douglas are sharing their thoughts on the guilty verdict delivered in federal court this morning. However, the verdict doesn’t erase the damage left behind.

headlines: FUMBLED FUNDS? Tucson Seminoles football program families question spending
description: A lot of questions are swirling around a new youth football organization.

headlines: Ex-Buckeye middle school teacher had ‘sleepovers’ with student, Buckeye police say
description: A former Verrado Middle School was arrested after police said he had multiple "sleepovers" with a 12-year-old student, even though he doesn't have a daughter.

headlines: Preston Lord’s family files wrongful death lawsuit against 7 suspects, parents
description: The parents of Preston Lord have filed a wrongful death lawsuit against the seven suspects accused of his murder and several parents.

headlines: Driver arrested after fleeing from trooper, causing crash in Phoenix
description: A driver is in custody after fleeing from Department of Public safety troopers and causing a crash in Phoenix on Thursday morning.

headlines: UPDATE: Woman shot during Tucson domestic violence incident
description: The Tucson Police Department confirmed it happened at a home in the 11400 block of East Dry Wind Drive.

headlines: Alleged firefighter impersonator accused of telling residents to evacuate due to Hillside Fire, causing panic
description: No evacuations have been ordered yet, the sheriff's office confirmed.

headlines: NEW INFORMATION: Jury convicts man charged in Douglas church arsons
description: A jury of eight women and four men are reviewing the evidence in the case of two churches being set on fire.

headlines: 2 indicted after firework explodes, damages Mesa home
description: Two young men have been indicted on felony charges for allegedly using a firework to cause an explosion at a Mesa home last month.

headlines: Arizona State Senate candidate accused of removing opponent's campaign flyer from residence
description: New video appears to shows Arizona State Senate candidate Leezah Sun taking down a political opponent’s flyer at a Valley home and replacing it with her own.

headlines: Father of Phoenix man shot and killed by Police says DOJ report backs up his criticism
description: The father of a man who was shot and killed by Phoenix police said the DOJ report proves the criticism he's made.

headlines: Phoenix man accused of beating 6-year-old, placing hot handcuffs on her legs
description: A Phoenix man is facing child abuse charges for allegedly beating a 6-year-old girl and forcing her to wear hot handcuffs.

headlines: Tucson family speaks out one year after deadly DUI crash
description: One year ago, Jessica Belen Felix and Raul Zepeda Gonzalez Jr. were driving in Tucson when they were hit by an alleged drunk driver.

headlines: Arrest made in 20-year-old cold case, suspect extradited back to Phoenix
description: Phoenix police say they arrested Sergio Reyes on Wednesday, 20 years to the day after 15-year-old Elena Lasswell was found murdered.

headlines: One month into Biden’s border order: Yuma County nonprofit sees decrease in migrants
description: The Regional Center for Border Health is a nonprofit that prevents migrant street releases, says they're seeing fewer people come through the system.

headlines: No charges to be filed after animal control officer seen dragging dog in Winslow
description: Prosecutors won't seek charges for an animal control officer caught on camera dragging a dog in Winslow.

headlines: Parents face endangerment charges after child accidentally shoots himself near Mesa
description: The parents of a 3-year-old boy who accidentally shot himself in the head almost two months ago near Mesa are facing endangerment charges, MCSO says.

headlines: House Democrat files impeachment articles against 2 U.S. Supreme Court justices
description: The Democratic lawmaker from New York has introduced impeachment articles against Justices Clarence Thomas and Samuel Alito.

headlines: UPDATE: Both sides rest in trial for accused church arsonist
description: The jury hears phone calls between Eric Ridenour and his wife after his arrest as he refers to his views on homosexuals and women in church leadership positions.

headlines: Arizona state prison sergeant arrested for alleged sexual assault of subordinate
description: A sergeant at the Lewis State Prison complex in Buckeye has been arrested for allegedly sexually assaulting an employee who worked under his supervision.

headlines: VIDEO: Scottsdale neighborhood rocked by mysterious fireworks explosion
description: Security video shows someone tossing out what is believed to be a lit firework and speeds away just moments before the explosion.

headlines: Pima County may reverse decision on eliminating constable position
description: The Pima County Board of Supervisors appears to be on the verge of reversing a decision it made in May to eliminate not only a constable’s position for Precinct 4 but also to eliminate the precinct.

headlines: Jury is seated in Alec Baldwin’s involuntary manslaughter trial in New Mexico
description: Jury selection starts Tuesday in Santa Fe, New Mexico, in the actor's trial on a charge of involuntary manslaughter that could get him 18 months in prison.

headlines: Northern Arizona man arrested on attempted homicide charges
description: Frank Ross, 66, has been arrested in connection with a shooting that left another man fighting for his life in Seligman.

headlines: Former temporary Maricopa County election worker indicted on multiple charges
description: The Maricopa County Attorney’s Office has announced the indictment of a man accused of taking equipment while he was a temporary worker at the county election’s office. He is also charged with other thefts in the weeks before that arrest

headlines: NEW INFORMATION: George Kelly case dismissed
description: The jury was deadlocked last week over whether or not to convict the rancher on a second-degree murder charge.

headlines: Teen arrested for causing deadly, fiery crash, Phoenix police say
description: A 19-year-old is facing felony charges after police said she was impaired and caused a deadly crash in north Phoenix.

headlines: Man hospitalized after shooting in Chandler
description: A man is injured after being shot late Monday night in Chandler.

headlines: Officials reveal where Kelly Paduchowski’s body, other evidence was found in Flagstaff
description: Flagstaff Police have now revealed the area in Flagstaff where Kelly Paduchowski’s remains were found on Friday. The discovery came after days of searching for her.

headlines: Trial starts for Eric Ridenour, man accused of setting fire to two Douglas churches
description: Arson trial starts for Eric Ridenour who is charged with burning two churches in Douglas in May 2023.

headlines: Woman accused of manslaughter months after golf cart crash near Litchfield Park
description: A West Valley woman is facing a felony manslaughter crash months after a deadly golf cart crash near Litchfield Park.

headlines: Victim critical, suspect arrested in Tucson aggravated assault
description: The victim was taken to the hospital with life threatening injuries.

headlines: Man sentenced to 32+ years for killing ex-girlfriend while she slept at Glendale home
description: The Maricopa County Attorney’s Office has announced the sentencing for a man convicted of killing her ex-girlfriend while she slept.

headlines: NEW DETAILS: South Tucson Police arrest suspect in shooting death
description: Police say officers arrested 30-year-old Jose Chavez Saturday, July 6.

headlines: Mohave County woman calls 911 after shooting husband
description: A woman is in jail for attempting to murder her husband, police say.

headlines: NEW DETAILS: Tucson Police identify person killed in south side shooting
description: The Tucson Police Department said the shooting happened at a home west of the airport.

headlines: 2 teens accused of setting Gilbert barn on fire with others inside
description: Two juveniles have been arrested for arson after allegedly setting a building on fire in a Gilbert neighborhood Wednesday night.

headlines: Homicide investigation underway after woman found dead in downtown Phoenix hotel
description: A woman was found dead inside a popular downtown Phoenix hotel on Friday morning.

headlines: DPS conducting high visibility patrols for Arizonans heading home from holiday weekend
description: The Department of Public Safety will be conducting high-visibility patrols and DUI enforcement as folks start to head home from the holiday weekend.

headlines: Man shot near First, Fort Lowell in Tucson
description: The TPD said the man was transported to the hospital with injuries that were not life-threatening.

headlines: Whistleblower says Boeing used scrap parts on new planes
description: The latest whistleblower alleges the company knowingly used defective parts in its planes.
